title: Questions and comments texted to Gov. Phil Murphy on Aug. 24, 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Jersey Open Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

An electronic list of all messages sent on  August 24, 2023 to the (732) 605-5455  text number promoted by Gov. Phil Murphy in the following message and press release.

 https://twitter.com/GovMurphy/status/1694696068578254941?s=20
https://www.nj.gov/governor/news/news/562023/20230824b.shtml

This is a follow-up to a previous request handled by Valentina DiPippo, which can be found at this link: https://www.muckrock.com/foi/new-jersey-229/questions-and-comments-texted-to-gov-phil-murphy-152114/#file-1125613

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: Chicago Public Schools: HEPA filters in every classroom update

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Chicago Public Schools: HEPA filters in every classroom update
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I request an update from the November 4, 2020 posted plan to provide HEPA filters in every classroom.

https://www.cps.edu/press-releases/chicago-public-schools-invests-$82.5-million-to-provide-hepa-air-purifiers-for-every-classroom

Specifically, how many HEPA filters in how many classrooms have been deployed by school, including School ID, School name, number of classrooms in that school, and number of HEPA filters provided to date (November 1,  2023).

SchoolID
SchoolName
ClassroomCount
HEPAFiltersPresent

If there is an updated plan, I also request a copy of that plan.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sandra Tilmon
